Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.5 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaduka » 10.5.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » 10.5.1--7.1--4 Paccayānulomādi
10.5.1--7.1--4.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayānulomādi
Vibhaṅgavāra
185.
2763Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2764Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṃsaṭṭhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
2765(Cittasaṃsaṭṭhadukaṃ yathā cittasampayuttadukaṃ evaṃ kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
2766Cittasaṃsaṭṭhadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 10.5.1--7.1--4 Paccayānulomādiup10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka >>
